entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Belleville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:59 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Fog, 6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 11:00 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain and Fog
Temperature: 6.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 6.4°C
Wind: SSW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle early this evening. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
